channel.title: Books on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: Reader's Digest 2020-01
item.description: Reader’s Digest I thought it would a cool idea if I kept a summary of the things I’ve read or listened to on a monthly basis. Here is January of 2021 so far. Enjoy. All systems red - Murderbot This book is SHORT. It’s little over 3 hours of listening time. I’m listening at 1.30 so it’s just short of 2 hours. But it’s entertaining. The murderbot series is following a rouge security bot which hacked its own governor module and is self aware and free.
